task_summary: The robot is tasked to pour liquid from a cup into a mug using a structured pouring maneuver, as captured in nine sequential contact sheet frames. The BT implements detection, approach, pour, and retreat.

task_long_description.overview: This episode centers on a robotic arm executing the 'pour into the mug' task. The workspace contains a white mug on a table and a brown cup held by the robot. The robot must visually locate the mug, approach with the cup, align, and perform a controlled pour, ensuring liquid transfer. After pouring, the robot retracts the cup from above the mug. The scene is static; accuracy of mug localization and approach without spillage are key constraints.
preconditions: The mug is upright and placed on the work surface.
The cup is held securely by the robot gripper.
Both cup and mug are within reachable workspace.
stepwise_plan: Detect and verify visibility of the mug.
Detect and verify visibility of the cup.
Approach and align the cup over the mug with tolerance.
Confirm spatial proximity to the mug.
Pour from the cup into the mug with appropriate tilt and pour rate.
Retract the cup from above the mug after pouring.
success_criteria: Liquid successfully transferred from the cup into the mug.
No significant spillage outside the mug.
Cup returns to a safe distance after pouring.
failure_and_recovery: If mug detection fails, retry 'DetectObject' on mug.
If alignment error detected, re-approach with allowed tolerance.
If pour fails (jammed or blocked), abort and retry with adjusted tilt.
task_long_description.termination: Task terminates when pouring completes and the cup is retracted above a threshold distance from the mug.

frame_3.now_evidence: first stable contact and alignment cue visible
frame_3.predicts_next: push actuation expected; confirms goal direction

node_specs.description: Checks if the mug is visible in the robot's sensors.
Attempts to detect the mug using vision.
Checks if the cup is visible to ensure a valid grasp.
Attempts to detect the cup before pouring.
Brings the cup to pouring position above the mug.
Verifies that the robot is at the mug's location.
Pours contents from cup into mug.
Retracts the cup from mug after pouring.

recovery_strategy: Retry detection on mug/cup if initial check fails
Re-approach with corrected alignment if tolerance exceeded
Abort pour on failure and reset
Alert on spillage and switch to safe mode
assumptions: Instruction mentions 'pour', but frames confirm the cup is the source and mug the target.
Amount to pour is not visually apparent, defaulted to null.
Pour rate set to 'normal' as no evidence of urgency/slow pour.

expected_success_criteria: Pour from cup ends inside mug
